thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Alain Locussol
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Alain Locussol

author: Alain Locussol
title: Alain Locussol
text: The one-week February 2017 trip to Costa Rica organized by Rebecca Anderson of CRV for the two of us went smoothly and exactly as scheduled. Upon arrival at the San Jose airport, we were efficiently assisted to clear immigration and customs. All drivers always showed up on time, their cars were in excellent condition, their driving prudent and their command of English sufficient to entertain interesting conversations. Hotels selected were of first quality and very well located. Tour guides in the two national parks visited (Arenal and Manuel Antonio) spoke perfect English and were very knowledgeable. We were extremely pleased with CRV efficient assistance and would not hesitate to recommend them if your objective is to spend a hassle-free vacation in a beautiful and very friendly country.
